name: Orbital Rise
description:
A wonderfully casual game for a race to the top. Dash across the screen as you rise to the top of a geometry themed world. Enjoy the addicting impulse and rush to avoid obstacles and change the scenery as you progress.

Compete for High-scores with your friends on Google play games

Unlock achievements!

Collect orbs to unlock silly characters and fancy colors.

Choose your mode: Levels, or Endless!

Billions of levels!
